alfredsnippet.snippet:
import statsmodels.api as sm
import statsmodels.formula.api as smf

# using sm
y = df.Violence
X1 = sm.add_constant(df.Unemployment)
mod = sm.OLS(y, X1 )
res = mod.fit()
res.summary()

# using smf
formula = 'y ~ x'
mod = smf.ols(formula=formula, data=df)
res = mod.fit()
res.summary()
alfredsnippet.name: statsmodels ols
